statements: DELETE FROM Reports WHERE id = 100 AND report_name = 'Quarterly Sales Report';
DELETE FROM Reports WHERE revenue > 10000 OR profit_margin < 0.2;
DELETE FROM revenue_report WHERE profit_margin < 0.1 AND revenue > 10000;
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND address LIKE '%California%'
DELETE FROM revenue_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND revenue > 5000;
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 25 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM profit_margin WHERE profit > 500 AND margin < 30;
DELETE FROM customer_reports WHERE customer_id = 101 AND sales_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM demographic_reports WHERE age_group = '18-25' AND gender = 'Female';
